description: Pages contain an application's UI. Top-level pages are included in the application's main menu.

open.description: Opens the page, i.e. makes it the active page.

close.description: Closes and disposes of the page.

appear.description: Fired when the page is about to become visible, i.e. it has become the active page.

disappear.description: Fired when the page is no longer visible, i.e. another page has become the active page.

links.title: Snippet for creating a full screen Page
